properties.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Central Coast
properties.headline: High Surf Warning issued December 31 at 10:17AM PST until January 2 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the High Surf Warning, dangerously large breaking
waves of 15 to 20 feet with dangerous rip currents. For the High
Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 10 to 15 feet with
dangerous rip currents.

* WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Central Coast and Santa Barbara
County Central Coast.

* WHEN...For the High Surf Warning, from 2 PM Wednesday to 2 PM
PST Thursday. For the High Surf Advisory, until 2 PM PST
Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Powerful waves and strong rip currents will pose an
exceptional risk of ocean drowning and damage to coastal
structures like piers and jetties. Large breaking waves can
cause injury, wash people off beaches and rocks, and capsize
small boats near shore.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Local damaging sets are expected Wednesday
and Thursday and could damage piers and structures.
properties.instruction:
Everyone should remain out of the water due to life-threatening
surf conditions. Stay off of jetties, piers, and other water side
infrastructure.

NWSheadline: HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM WEDNESDAY TO 2 PM PST THURSDAY
